notes.home: Identified TrustSignals dynamic import causing CLS on load. Converted to static import.

fix.description: Converted `TrustSignals` from dynamic to static import in `app/page.tsx`.
fix.impact: Eliminated CLS caused by `TrustSignals` loading client-side without a placeholder. It is now server-rendered.
fix.verification: Manual code inspection confirms static import. Build verified with `pnpm build` (after fixing unrelated build errors).
